com.hazelcast.monitor.impl

Interface IndexOperationStats

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GlobalIndexOperationStats, PartitionIndexOperationStats

    public interface IndexOperationStats
    Provides per-operation statistics tracking for indexes.

    Instances of implementing classes are assumed to be used by a single thread at any given time. Therefore, implementations are not required to be thread-safe.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static IndexOperationStats EMPTY
      Empty no-op index operation stats instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getEntryCountDelta()
      Returns the indexed entry count delta produced as a result of an index operation.
      long getMemoryCostDelta()
      Returns the memory cost delta produced as a result of an index operation.
      void onEntryAdded(Object replacedValue, Object addedValue)
      Invoked by the associated index on every entry addition.
      void onEntryRemoved(Object removedValue)
      Invoked by the associated index on every entry removal.

    • Field Detail

      • EMPTY

        static final IndexOperationStats EMPTY
        Empty no-op index operation stats instance.

    • Method Detail

      • getEntryCountDelta

        long getEntryCountDelta()
        Returns the indexed entry count delta produced as a result of an index operation.

      • getMemoryCostDelta

        long getMemoryCostDelta()
        Returns the memory cost delta produced as a result of an index operation.

      • onEntryAdded

        void onEntryAdded(Object replacedValue,
                  Object addedValue)
        Invoked by the associated index on every entry addition.
        Parameters:
        replacedValue - the old replaced value or null if no value was associated with an index key for which an operation was performed.
        addedValue - the new added value.

      • onEntryRemoved

        void onEntryRemoved(Object removedValue)
        Invoked by the associated index on every entry removal.
        Parameters:
        removedValue - the old removed value or null if no value was associated with an index key for which an operation was performed.
